00047 class gettext_reader {
00048   //public:
00049    var $error = 0; // public variable that holds error code (0 if no error)
00050    
00051    //private:
00052   var $BYTEORDER = 0;        // 0: low endian, 1: big endian
00053   var $STREAM = NULL;
00054   var $short_circuit = false;
00055   var $enable_cache = false;
00056   var $originals = NULL;      // offset of original table
00057   var $translations = NULL;    // offset of translation table
00058   var $pluralheader = NULL;    // cache header field for plural forms
00059   var $total = 0;          // total string count
00060   var $table_originals = NULL;  // table for original strings (offsets)
00061   var $table_translations = NULL;  // table for translated strings (offsets)
00062   var $cache_translations = NULL;  // original -> translation mapping
00063 
00064 
00065   /* Methods */
00066   
00067     
00074   function readint() {
00075       if ($this->BYTEORDER == 0) {
00076         // low endian
00077         return array_shift(unpack('V', $this->STREAM->read(4)));
00078       } else {
00079         // big endian
00080         return array_shift(unpack('N', $this->STREAM->read(4)));
00081       }
00082     }
00083 
00090   function readintarray($count) {
00091     if ($this->BYTEORDER == 0) {
00092         // low endian
00093         return unpack('V'.$count, $this->STREAM->read(4 * $count));
00094       } else {
00095         // big endian
00096         return unpack('N'.$count, $this->STREAM->read(4 * $count));
00097       }
00098   }
00099   
00106   function gettext_reader($Reader, $enable_cache = true) {
00107     // If there isn't a StreamReader, turn on short circuit mode.
00108     if (! $Reader || isset($Reader->error) ) {
00109       $this->short_circuit = true;
00110       return;
00111     }
00112     
00113     // Caching can be turned off
00114     $this->enable_cache = $enable_cache;
00115 
00116     // $MAGIC1 = (int)0x950412de; //bug in PHP 5
00117     $MAGIC1 = (int) - 1794895138;
00118     // $MAGIC2 = (int)0xde120495; //bug
00119     $MAGIC2 = (int) - 569244523;
00120 
00121     $this->STREAM = $Reader;
00122     $magic = $this->readint();
00123     if ($magic == $MAGIC1) {
00124       $this->BYTEORDER = 0;
00125     } elseif ($magic == $MAGIC2) {
00126       $this->BYTEORDER = 1;
00127     } else {
00128       $this->error = 1; // not MO file
00129       return false;
00130     }
00131     
00132     // FIXME: Do we care about revision? We should.
00133     $revision = $this->readint();
00134     
00135     $this->total = $this->readint();
00136     $this->originals = $this->readint();
00137     $this->translations = $this->readint();
00138   }
00139   
00147   function load_tables() {
00148     if (is_array($this->cache_translations) &&
00149       is_array($this->table_originals) &&
00150       is_array($this->table_translations))
00151       return;
00152     
00153     /* get original and translations tables */
00154     $this->STREAM->seekto($this->originals);
00155     $this->table_originals = $this->readintarray($this->total * 2);
00156     $this->STREAM->seekto($this->translations);
00157     $this->table_translations = $this->readintarray($this->total * 2);
00158     
00159     if ($this->enable_cache) {
00160       $this->cache_translations = array ();
00161       /* read all strings in the cache */
00162       for ($i = 0; $i < $this->total; $i++) {
00163         $this->STREAM->seekto($this->table_originals[$i * 2 + 2]);
00164         $original = $this->STREAM->read($this->table_originals[$i * 2 + 1]);
00165         $this->STREAM->seekto($this->table_translations[$i * 2 + 2]);
00166         $translation = $this->STREAM->read($this->table_translations[$i * 2 + 1]);
00167         $this->cache_translations[$original] = $translation;
00168       }
00169     }
00170   }
00171   
00179   function get_original_string($num) {
00180     $length = $this->table_originals[$num * 2 + 1];
00181     $offset = $this->table_originals[$num * 2 + 2];
00182     if (! $length)
00183       return '';
00184     $this->STREAM->seekto($offset);
00185     $data = $this->STREAM->read($length);
00186     return (string)$data;
00187   }
00188   
00196   function get_translation_string($num) {
00197     $length = $this->table_translations[$num * 2 + 1];
00198     $offset = $this->table_translations[$num * 2 + 2];
00199     if (! $length)
00200       return '';
00201     $this->STREAM->seekto($offset);
00202     $data = $this->STREAM->read($length);
00203     return (string)$data;
00204   }
00205   
00215   function find_string($string, $start = -1, $end = -1) {
00216     if (($start == -1) or ($end == -1)) {
00217       // find_string is called with only one parameter, set start end end
00218       $start = 0;
00219       $end = $this->total;
00220     }
00221     if (abs($start - $end) <= 1) {
00222       // We're done, now we either found the string, or it doesn't exist
00223       $txt = $this->get_original_string($start);
00224       if ($string == $txt)
00225         return $start;
00226       else
00227         return -1;
00228     } else if ($start > $end) {
00229       // start > end -> turn around and start over
00230       return $this->find_string($string, $end, $start);
00231     } else {
00232       // Divide table in two parts
00233       $half = (int)(($start + $end) / 2);
00234       $cmp = strcmp($string, $this->get_original_string($half));
00235       if ($cmp == 0)
00236         // string is exactly in the middle => return it
00237         return $half;
00238       else if ($cmp < 0)
00239         // The string is in the upper half
00240         return $this->find_string($string, $start, $half);
00241       else
00242         // The string is in the lower half
00243         return $this->find_string($string, $half, $end);
00244     }
00245   }
00246   
00254   function translate($string) {
00255     if ($this->short_circuit)
00256       return $string;
00257     $this->load_tables();     
00258     
00259     if ($this->enable_cache) {
00260       // Caching enabled, get translated string from cache
00261       if (array_key_exists($string, $this->cache_translations))
00262         return $this->cache_translations[$string];
00263       else
00264         return $string;
00265     } else {
00266       // Caching not enabled, try to find string
00267       $num = $this->find_string($string);
00268       if ($num == -1)
00269         return $string;
00270       else
00271         return $this->get_translation_string($num);
00272     }
00273   }
00274 
00281   function get_plural_forms() {
00282     // lets assume message number 0 is header  
00283     // this is true, right?
00284     $this->load_tables();
00285     
00286     // cache header field for plural forms
00287     if (! is_string($this->pluralheader)) {
00288       if ($this->enable_cache) {
00289         $header = $this->cache_translations[""];
00290       } else {
00291         $header = $this->get_translation_string(0);
00292       }
00293       if (eregi("plural-forms: ([^\n]*)\n", $header, $regs))
00294         $expr = $regs[1];
00295       else
00296         $expr = "nplurals=2; plural=n == 1 ? 0 : 1;";
00297       $this->pluralheader = $expr;
00298     }
00299     return $this->pluralheader;
00300   }
00301 
00309   function select_string($n) {
00310     $string = $this->get_plural_forms();
00311     $string = str_replace('nplurals',"\$total",$string);
00312     $string = str_replace("n",$n,$string);
00313     $string = str_replace('plural',"\$plural",$string);
00314     
00315     $total = 0;
00316     $plural = 0;
00317 
00318     eval("$string");
00319     if ($plural >= $total) $plural = $total - 1;
00320     return $plural;
00321   }
00322 
00332   function ngettext($single, $plural, $number) {
00333     if ($this->short_circuit) {
00334       if ($number != 1)
00335         return $plural;
00336       else
00337         return $single;
00338     }
00339 
00340     // find out the appropriate form
00341     $select = $this->select_string($number); 
00342     
00343     // this should contains all strings separated by NULLs
00344     $key = $single.chr(0).$plural;
00345     
00346     
00347     if ($this->enable_cache) {
00348       if (! array_key_exists($key, $this->cache_translations)) {
00349         return ($number != 1) ? $plural : $single;
00350       } else {
00351         $result = $this->cache_translations[$key];
00352         $list = explode(chr(0), $result);
00353         return $list[$select];
00354       }
00355     } else {
00356       $num = $this->find_string($key);
00357       if ($num == -1) {
00358         return ($number != 1) ? $plural : $single;
00359       } else {
00360         $result = $this->get_translation_string($num);
00361         $list = explode(chr(0), $result);
00362         return $list[$select];
00363       }
00364     }
00365   }
00366 
00367 }
